effect_entries.effect: Halves the target's Defense for damage calculation, which is similar to doubling the attack's power.
User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Powerful but makes
the user faint.

Powerful but makes
the user faint.

Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

The user blows up
to inflict severe
damage, even
making itself faint.

The user blows up to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

The user faints upon

Le lanceur explose en blessant
tous les Pokémon autour de lui.
Le lanceur tombe K.O.

The user attacks everything around it
by causing an explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

The user attacks everything around it
by causing an explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

ばくはつを　おこして　じぶんの
まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかった　あとに　ひんしに　なる。

폭발을 일으켜서 자신의
주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
쓰고 나서 기절하게 된다.

Le lanceur explose en blessant tous les Pokémon
autour de lui. Le lanceur tombe K.O.

Anwender sprengt sich, richtet rundum
Riesenschaden an und wird dabei besiegt.

El atacante explota y hiere a todos a su alrededor.
El usuario se debilita de inmediato.

Chi la usa esplode e infligge danni ai Pokémon
che ha intorno, ma poi va KO.

The user attacks everything around it
by causing an explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

爆発を　おこして　自分の
周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。
使ったあとに　ひんしに　なる。

引起爆炸，
攻擊自己周圍所有的寶可夢。
使用後自己會陷入瀕死。

autour de lui. Le lanceur tombe K.O.

rundum Riesenschaden anrichtet und selbst
kampfunfähig wird.
